column6: The team from Paradise and the Wolverines team up for the Assault on Mr. Sinister and his snowy fortress but what surprises lay in store when they figure out the front door is actually the easiest way in? Sinister has more than plans for Logan's body in his lair...but how are the Amazing X-Men involved in his plans for destruction and perfection? Special appearance by Fing Fang Boom!
column8: | penciller (cover):Nick Bradshaw | writer:Ray Fawkes | writer:Charles Soule | artist:Jonathan Marks
